dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 869 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to broaden the special rules for certain governmental plans under section 105(j) to include plans established by political subdivisions.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Reichert (for himself and Mr. Blumenauer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to broaden the special rules for certain governmental plans under section 105(j) to include plans established by political subdivisions.

section.header: Expansion of application of special rules for certain governmental plans to include plans established by political subdivisions

subsection.text: Section 105(j)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting or established by or on behalf of a State or political subdivision thereof after public retirement system, and
by inserting or 501(c)(9) after section 115 in subparagraph (B) thereof.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to payments after the date of the enactment of this Act.
